comment: I wish someone or could try to help me understand why I pay for Prime . Delivery continues to get less reliable and more delayed . Every time . Last two orders ( both within the last days ) have been late , days past the Prime window . Status " Delayed " .
amr:
# ::snt I wish someone or could try to help me understand why I pay for Prime . Delivery continues to get less reliable and more delayed . Every time . Last two orders ( both within the last days ) have been late , days past the Prime window . Status " Delayed " .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (w / wish-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (p / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (t / try-01
                        :ARG0 (s / someone)
                        :ARG1 (h / help-01
                              :ARG0 s
                              :ARG1 (u / understand-01
                                    :ARG0 ii
                                    :ARG1 (t2 / thing
                                          :ARG0-of (c / cause-01
                                                :ARG1 (p2 / pay-01
                                                      :ARG0 ii
                                                      :ARG3 (p3 / product
                                                            :name (n / name
                                                                  :op1 "Prime")))))
                                    :ARG2 ii)
                              :ARG2 s)))
            :snt2 (c2 / continue-01
                  :ARG1 (g / get-03
                        :ARG1 (d / deliver-01)
                        :ARG2 (a / and
                              :op1 (h2 / have-degree-91
                                    :ARG1 d
                                    :ARG2 (r / rely-01
                                          :ARG1 d)
                                    :ARG3 (l / less))
                              :op2 (h3 / have-degree-91
                                    :ARG1 d
                                    :ARG2 (d2 / delay-01
                                          :ARG1 d)
                                    :ARG3 (m2 / more)))))
            :snt3 (l2 / late-02
                  :ARG1 (o / order
                        :quant 2
                        :mod (l3 / last)
                        :ARG1-of (m3 / mean-01
                              :ARG2 (b / before
                                    :op1 (w2 / window
                                          :mod p3)
                                    :quant (m4 / multiple
                                          :op1 (t3 / temporal-quantity
                                                :quant 1
                                                :unit (d3 / day)))))))
            :frequency (t4 / time
                  :mod (e / every)))
      :snt4 (d4 / delay-01
            :ARG1 (s2 / status)))
